preface.title: Purpose of this guide
preface.para: This guide describes the installation and usage of the Web:Extend PHP framework. It is an introductory guide rather than a complete reference, addressed primarily to new Web:Extend developers.

This guide is not a PHP tutorial: knowledge of the PHP5 language is required. Although we provide an explanatory chapter, it is also recommended to understand the concepts of relational databases and their use in web applications.
You are welcome to contribute to this guide through additions, corrections or translations. See for more information.
